ComicInfo.Summary:
Polly and her sister Sue are here to stay. Some of the boys are OK with that. And others... well, let's just say they're not taking it too well! Can all the KIDZ adjust to this new reality? While still managing to successfully fend off the insane zombie apocalypse happening all around them?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A (Zombieland Movie Poster Parody) | Pasquale Qualano | 1 | B | Cover B | Jocelyn Joret | 2 | C | Cover C | Steve Baker | 3 | D | Cover D | Calou Rzé | 4 | E | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Foil Cover E | Steve Baker | 5 |
